strapiPost.title: Half The World
strapiPost.content:
On the latest episode on I Am Northwest Arkansas, local attorney and podcast host talk about the business world for women, its challenges, and improvement efforts by organizations.

  • Support: One local effort specifically mentioned is a networking group called Woman-Run, which is a resource for connections and community for women in business. The group meets in both NWA and Little Rock, and is supported by several Chambers of Commerces in the state.
  • Want to get involved? There is a virtual Woman-Run event on Friday from 12-1p with founders of a new mentorship program called VCWoman Achieve.

Listen to the podcast episode HERE or register for the event HERE.
